---
title: Stormwater Runoff Expectations
output: html_output
---

```{r, setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
source(here::here("activities", "src", "storm_runoff.R"))
```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
watershed_area <- 182
imp_frac <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)

est_runoff <- get_predicted_runoff(imp_frac, wtrshed_area = watershed_area)

est_runoff_df <- data.frame("impervious_fractions" = imp_frac, "est_runoff" = est_runoff)

ggplot(data = est_runoff_df, aes(x = impervious_fractions, y = est_runoff)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  xlab("Impervious Fraction (I"[A]~")") +
  ylab("Estimated Runoff") +
  labs(title = "Estimated Stormwater Runoff") +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = "0.5")
  )
```
